data.title: Of Blessed Memory, z"l
data.meta_description: We look back and remember in fondness these Fabrangeners and their family members who have passed. Over the years, Fabrangen has mourned the loss of members of our community. Fabrangen …
data.text:
We look back and remember in fondness these Fabrangeners and their family members who have passed.

Over the years, Fabrangen has mourned the loss of members of our community.

Fabrangen acknowledges the compassionate and caring work of all those who have participated in the work of the Chevra Kadisha.

From Fabrangen – Celebrating 36 Years

The following lists are from Fabrangen – Celebrating 36 Years, the Memorial Quilt, the Yizkor booklets, and individual contributions from the community.

Please send any updates to Elena Rodriguez at coordinator@fabrangen.org.

Please include first name, last name, year of birth, and year of death. If you would like to include a link to an obituary, please do.

Fabrangen Havurah

7750 16th Street NW
